INSERT IGNORE INTO `db_stock`.`tb_board_list` (`grpno`, `grpord`, `depth`, `category`, `title`, `content`, `passwd`, `writer`, `viewcount`, `reg_date`) VALUES
(#{board.grpno}, #{board.grpord}, #{board.depth} , #{board.category}, #{board.title}, #{board.content} , password(#{board.passwd}), #{board.writer}, 0 , now())
